Content: (Your reaching hands touch what|feels like a shirt and an arm.)
(You hear a giggle and feel someone brush past you.)
(You grasp and wrestle them frantically.  Someone|else passes you some cuffs and helps you capture.)
(You push against them and into something hard.|You sense the others rushing to help the capture.)
(They dodged you attempt to capture and you fall,|land in a heap on the floor.)
Polo.|(That came from the other side of the room.)
Polo.|(It sounded like that from just to the right of you.)
Polo.|(That was someone close behind you.)
Polo.  (That was defiantly in|front of you, but a few strides away.)
(You can hear giggling to your left|and someone hit a table in front of you.)
(One of the girls yells Polo in your|right ear before running it away.)
(Someone is pushing tables around forwards|and right a bit from where you are.)
(An eerie hush fills the room,|broken by unsubtle tiptoeing and laughter.)
(You turn and take a stride.)
(You turn and find a chair left in the way,|taking care to step around it.)
(Sudden noises cause you to spin round sharply.|Nothings there, but how far did you just turn?)
(You edge round slowly, sure a table should|have been there, but its not now.)
(Taking a confident stride forwards,|you clatter into some desks.)
(As you move forward someone shouts behind you.)|No were over here.
(You glance a chair as you walk forwards. To you|left someone exclaims.) Rats, she missed it.
(There is nothing there as you walk forwards.)
(Creeping steadily backwards, you find nothing there.)
(Hearing a sound, you spin round quickly,|but find only empty space.)
(A table gets in your way, creaking loudly as you feel your way around it.)
Shh, she'll hear us.  (Was that a couple of|girls to you left or more in front of you?)
(You tumble over a chair and fall down.)|Another one bites the dust. Give her a penalty.
(You are shoved backwards and over another person|crouching behind you.)  She's down, that's a penalty.
(As you stumble into a desk, a push sends you down.)|Looks like this game has gone into penalty time.
(In the confusion you trip over your own feet,|landing on the floor.)  That's a penalty.
(As you stand up, someone pulls your arms behind|you, cuffs them together and then runs off.)
(Group of them pin you down, find all your items|and run off with them before you can get up.)
(As you stand up, someone forces a ball gag into|your mouth, buckles it tight and then runs off.)
Oh just shut up.  (A ball gag is rammed into your|mouth and strapped tight.)  Now get on with it.
Bad luck, you're out of lives.  You can always|try to try again, but first you have a forfeit.
(Someone removes your gag.)|Were you trying to say something?
